page.title: 12ASHTON-IN-M GOLF CLUB
page.content: Ashton Golf Club is situated in Garswood Park, West side of the town. It consists of a clubhouse, professional shop and an 18 hole golf course. The clubhouse consists of a lounge, ladies room, gentlemens room and two locker rooms. In the professionals shop you can buy things like golf shoes, clubs, sweaters and many more things. The course is 5560 metres long. It consists of 4 par 3 holes, 12 par 4 holes and 2 par 5 holes which make up the 18 holes. There are 375 gentlemen members, 65 lady members and 114 junior members. The fees per year are 190 pounds for men,125 pounds for ladies. Competitions are held every Saturday, Wednesday, and during school holidays.
